title: Cross-chain Asset Transfer Standard
description: 現在、カルダノと他のチェーン（L1やサイドチェーン）との間のトークン転送の相互運用性の架け橋となる規格は存在しません。

f6_assessments.q0: Interoperability is really important for the Cardano ecosystem to thrive. Developing these types of standards will pave the way for greater adoption.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal team is highly qualified to deliver this proposal. It would be nice to see some more concrete deliverables and time frames and a justification for why the requested amount of $25k is required and how it will be spent.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposers have stated what they are building, however they have not given timelines as to when they would be done by. This makes it hard to audit progress. It would be nice if they defined what success looked like. Whilst the team is well known in this space, what are they doing to ensure what they produce becomes 'the' standard. How many projects implementing this standard and in what time frame would constitutes success?

solution: 私たちは、開発者が相互運用性のあるブリッジ・インターフェースを統一するためのメタデータ標準を作成します。
experience: 私たちのチームは、過去数年間にわたってカルダノのエコシステムを構築してきた、よく知られた元Emurgoや元IOHKの社員で構成されています
